# makeMTL4CommandQueue()

**Instance Method**

Creates a new command queue.

## Declaration

```swift
func makeMTL4CommandQueue() -> (any MTL4CommandQueue)?
```

## Return Value

A [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4CommandQueue] instance, or `nil` if the function failed.
title: makeMTL4CommandQueue()
